text:
Hi everyone,
Somehow `hs project dev` not working with me, but `hs project upload` is fine.
When I run `hs project dev` it returns no error like image but in the extension there is no `developing locally` badge, it simply not running.
I have to upload every time I want to see the result, which is a bit annoying and takes time.
Any help would be appreciated, thank you!

:wave: Can you make sure that
1. You've reloaded the page after starting the dev server
2. You're using the same portal for the dev server and the deployed version
We've seen a few instances where people upload to one portal but then run local server on another portal (like the sandbox) and then are confused why local dev isn't working, so it would be good to rule that out first.

Hi <@UNHBK8QNM>, thanks for reaching out
1. Yes sure, I did it multiple times
2. I think so, can you help me check if the is anything wrong with my HubSpot.config.yml?
I had this issue when using a chromium browser. Opening it in firefox instead worked for me
